attributes.action: Charge by the unit of alcohol to combat passive drinking - the devastating knock-on effect of excessive alcohol consumption on wider society
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is in support of Sir Liam Donaldson's proposal to a charge of 50p per unit of alcohol making a can of beer at least £1 and a bottle of wine £4. It has been suggested that this minimum pricing regime would be vital to combating Britain's binge drinking culture.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
